alert.note: Alert for Lower Jefferson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 08 at 3:14PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT SOUTHERN JEFFERSON COUNTY THROUGH 345 PM CDT... At 314 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Fannett to near Sabine Pass. Movement was south at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Port Arthur, Sabine Pass, Hamshire, Fannett, La Belle, Stowell, Winnie, and Sea Rim State Park. This includes Interstate 10 in Texas near mile marker 839. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
